me.taylorkelly.mywarp

Interface Game


  • public interface Game
    Represents the running game. Methods in this interface provide access to the game as it is running.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.concurrent.Executor getExecutor()
      Gets an Executor that executes submitted tasks within the Thread that handles the game's logic.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<LocalPlayer> getPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Gets an Optional containing the player of the given name, if such a player exists.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<LocalPlayer> getPlayer(java.util.UUID identifier)
      Gets an Optional containing the player of the given identifier, if such a player exists.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<LocalWorld> getWorld(java.lang.String name)
      Gets an Optional containing the world of the given name, if such a world exists.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<LocalWorld> getWorld(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
      Gets an Optional containing the world of the given unique identifier, if such a world exists.
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<LocalWorld> getWorlds()
      Gets an ImmutableSet with all worlds currently loaded on the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutor

        java.util.concurrent.Executor getExecutor()
        Gets an Executor that executes submitted tasks within the Thread that handles the game's logic. This is normally called 'synchronous' execution.
        Returns:
        the Executor

      • getPlayer

        com.google.common.base.Optional<LocalPlayer> getPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Gets an Optional containing the player of the given name, if such a player exists.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the player

      • getPlayer

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an Optional containing the player

      • getWorlds

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<LocalWorld> getWorlds()
        Gets an ImmutableSet with all worlds currently loaded on the server.
        Returns:
        an ImmutableSet with all loaded worlds

      • getWorld

        com.google.common.base.Optional<LocalWorld> getWorld(java.lang.String name)
